bill.summary: 11/3/2011--Introduced. Encourages: (1) individuals to seek training in the use of CPR (cardiopulmonary resuscitation) and AEDs (automated external defibrillators), and (2) bystanders to use hands-only CPR and AEDs to save the life of another person in cardiac arrest.
